description.raw:
DO NOT MERGE.

This is an attempt to fix Windows build for Gazebo 9 \(x64\). In this change, I am proposing to upgrade the toolchain to msvc2017, do dependencies refresh for msvc2017, and fix the build breaks first. Can we do a refresh on [http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/)?

* FreeImage3180Win32Win64.zip:

    * Binary SDK: [http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html](http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html)
    
* boost\_1\_67\_0.zip:

    * Binary SDK: [https://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost-binaries/1.67.0/boost\_1\_67\_0-msvc-14.1-64.exe/download](https://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost-binaries/1.67.0/boost_1_67_0-msvc-14.1-64.exe/download)
    
* qt-opensource-windows-x86-msvc2015\_64-5.7.0.zip

    * Binary SDK: [https://download.qt.io/archive/qt/5.7/5.7.0/qt-opensource-windows-x86-msvc2015\_64-5.7.0.exe.mirrorlist](https://download.qt.io/archive/qt/5.7/5.7.0/qt-opensource-windows-x86-msvc2015_64-5.7.0.exe.mirrorlist)
    
* ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip

    * Binary SDK: [https://bintray.com/ogrecave/ogre/download\_file?file\_path=ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip](https://bintray.com/ogrecave/ogre/download_file?file_path=ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip)
    

And here is the corresponding change to demonstrate it built with Gazebo repo:  
[https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/seanyen-msft/gazebo:gazebo9\_9.5.0\_stagingosrf/gazebo:gazebo9\_9.5.0#diff](https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/seanyen-msft/gazebo:gazebo9_9.5.0_staging%0Dosrf/gazebo:gazebo9_9.5.0#diff)

And here is a success run under Azure DevOps \(Check the “OSRF Job” where I mimic what Jenkins does\):  
[https://ros-win.visualstudio.com/ros-win/\_build/results?buildId=2256](https://ros-win.visualstudio.com/ros-win/_build/results?buildId=2256)
description.html:
DO NOT MERGE.

This is an attempt to fix Windows build for Gazebo 9 (x64). In this change, I am proposing to upgrade the toolchain to msvc2017, do dependencies refresh for msvc2017, and fix the build breaks first. Can we do a refresh on http://packages.osrfoundation.org/win32/deps/?

  • FreeImage3180Win32Win64.zip:

    • Binary SDK: http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html

  • boost_1_67_0.zip:

    • Binary SDK: https://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost-binaries/1.67.0/boost_1_67_0-msvc-14.1-64.exe/download

  • qt-opensource-windows-x86-msvc2015_64-5.7.0.zip

    • Binary SDK: https://download.qt.io/archive/qt/5.7/5.7.0/qt-opensource-windows-x86-msvc2015_64-5.7.0.exe.mirrorlist

  • ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip

    • Binary SDK: https://bintray.com/ogrecave/ogre/download_file?file_path=ogre-sdk-1.10.12-vc15-x64.zip

And here is the corresponding change to demonstrate it built with Gazebo repo:
https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/seanyen-msft/gazebo:gazebo9_9.5.0_stagingosrf/gazebo:gazebo9_9.5.0#diff

And here is a success run under Azure DevOps (Check the “OSRF Job” where I mimic what Jenkins does):
https://ros-win.visualstudio.com/ros-win/_build/results?buildId=2256

title.raw: Upgrade Windows dependencies for Gazebo and build support
